lines: Ncili afwafwi munsi kwako, Kondikwela Mufutuli wangu,
Ndivumbe ngubo yako Mwami, Ndisise mu cuyubilo cako.
Ncili afwaafwi ndi mucete, Nsejisi ca kupa Jesu wangu,
Pele imoyo wangu mubi, Kondisanzya mubulowa bwako;
Ncili afwaafwi ndibe wako, Zinyonyono zyangu ndazisiya,
Kuli sumpula koonse nkubi, Kondipa Jesu wakandifwida,
